main event: A UFO sighting report recorded in Wadsworth, Ohio on August 8, 1958, describing an object that dropped from the sky.
interesting points: The observed object was described as a thin walled tube made of yellow brass., The object had been used for various purposes like a fishing pole handle and lamp fixture., Numbers were hand scratched on the aluminum cap of the object., The object was reported to have dropped from the sky at 2000 hours., No photographs were included in the report.
sighted object: thin walled tube made of yellow brass
